Package com.lambdaschool.schools.repositories

Interface AnimalRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Animal,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Animal,​java.lang.Long>
    public interface AnimalRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Animal,​java.lang.Long>
    The CRUD repository connecting Animals to the rest of the application

    • Method Summary

        count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteById, existsById, findAll, findAllById, findById, save, saveAll

    • Method Detail

      • getCountAnimalInZoo

        @Query(value="SELECT a.animalid, a.animaltype, count(z.zooid) as countzoos FROM zooanimals z RIGHT JOIN animals a ON z.animalid=a.animalid GROUP BY a.animalid, a.animaltype ORDER BY a.animaltype",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.ArrayList<CountAnimalInZoo> getCountAnimalInZoo()
        Custom query finding the student and the number of zoos where they are located
        Returns:
        List (element type is CountAnimalInZoo) containing student id, student type, and the count of zoos where the student is located ordered by student type

      • updateAnimalType

        @Transactional
@Modifying
@Query(value="UPDATE animals SET animaltype = :name, last_modified_by = :uname, last_modified_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE animalid = :animalid",
       nativeQuery=true)
void updateAnimalType​(java.lang.String uname,
                      long animalid,
                      java.lang.String name)
        Updates the name of the student based on the given student id.
        Parameters:
        uname - The username making this change
        animalid - the primary key (long) of the student to change
        name - the new type (String) of this student
